sources.title: 1939 Drei Väter Um Anna ( Beppo Brem, Georg Vogelsang)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1939. Drei Väter um anna.  U.a mit Beppo Brem und Georg Vogelsang

metadata.Plot: A cabaret singer entrusts her illegitimate daughter to a country doctor but doesn't say which of three friends of his is the father. Rumors are spread and relationships are strained until one man admits the truth.
metadata.Writer: Walther Kloepfer, Werner Eplinius, Gustav Kampendonk
metadata.Actors: Ilse Werner, Hans Stüwe, Theodor Danegger
